title: Multiple Subject (Elementary) Student Teaching Seminar-I
description: First course in the series. Seminar topics include engaging and supporting all students in learning; creating and maintaining effective environments for student learning; understanding and organizing subject matter for student learning; planning instruction and learning experiences for all students; assessing student learning; and developing as a professional educator. Prerequisites: ED76 or ED78 majors for Elementary Multiple Subjects only. Affirmed Multiple Subject Credential candidate at UC San Diego who has advanced to student teaching. EDS 369A must be taken as a corequisite.
